name: 2024 the 10th International Conference on Virtual Reality
content: Publication: Accepted papers will be included in ICVR 2024 conference proceedings, which will be published by IEEE and be archived in IEEE Xplore. The proceedings will be submitted to be indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus, etc.. ICVR 2024 in IEEE listï¼šhttps://conferences.ieee.org/conferences\_events/conferences/conferencedetails/62393
